ProductInfo.Features:
1) Dual band, Network: GSM900 / 1800MHz 2) Single SIM Card 3) Display Size : 1.5 inch touch screen 4) Ringtones Type : Polyphonic / MP3
5) Audio File format : MP3 / MIDI 6) Video File format : 3GP / MPEG4 (AVI) 7) Image File format : JPEG / BMP / GIF 8) E-book format : TXT
9) FM Radio 85-110 MHz (Worldwide) 10) Data Transfer : USB / Bluetooth 11) Input : Handwriting 12) Camera : 1.3 Mega pixels digital camera
13) Support Video recorder, Sound recorder 14) Messaging : SMS / MMS 15) Built in 45KB memory, Support TF Card, Max 4GB. 16) Languages (option): English, Spanish, Russian, Simple Chinese, Greek, Persian, Malay, Indonesian, Arabic , Vietnamese
17) Other function: Calendar / Alarm / Calculator / QQ / MSN 18) Dimension: 275 x 55 x 18mm 19) li-ion battery: 3.7V 450mAh 20) Weight: 101g (including battery)
